content:
advertisement

Moye said the whole team is progressing well this spring especially the receivers 

Moye said theres a chance he could play this Saturday concussion

Moye on the teams injuries 

Moye was running a post route in practice two Saturdays ago and took a big hit and stood up feeling dizzy PERIOD His symptoms started to disappear this past Sunday PERIOD

He added that Justin Brown has been progressing really well 

Moye said both Bolden and McGloin have been looking really good and want the starting spot badly 

Moye said Bolden has shown a little more confidence has been more vocal in practice PERIOD He added that he thinks Bolden will come back for the fall and has given himself a good chance to win the starting job PERIOD

Moye is excited for a shot at the Big Ten championship game
